author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 70-year-old retired employee of Bharat Earth Movers Ltd. (BEML) was found dead in a water sump under mysterious circumstances at his residence in Papa Reddypalya in Jnanabharathi on Tuesday morning.

The deceased is Sachi Lingaiah, who was staying with his wife. Their three children are all married and living separately.

According to police sources, Lingaiah was depressed as he was in deep financial debt
title: Retired employee of BEML found dead
